resources.string:
Enter one of the following:
<word>
useCat <char> <strength>
	char: G(anger),A(anticipation),D(disgust),F(fear),
		J(joy),S(sadness),U(suprise),T(trust)
	strength: 0(unsaturated) to 1(saturated)
l <level>
	level: 0-all, 1-feeling expanded 2-feeling, 3-cnvc
zoom <float>
	set amplification factor
zoomBy <float>
	multiply amplification by
<valence> <arousal> <dominance>
	values from 0 to 1
	valence: positive--negative or pleasure--displeasure
	arousal: excited--calm or active--passive
	dominance: powerful--weak or have control--have no control
